023
024package org.opt4j.benchmarks;
025
026import java.util.Random;
027
028import org.opt4j.core.common.random.Rand;
029import org.opt4j.core.problem.Creator;
030
031import com.google.inject.Inject;
032
033/**
034 * The {@link DoubleCreator} creates {@link DoubleString}s with the length
035 * {@code n}.
036 * 
037 * @author lukasiewycz
038 * 
039 */
040public class DoubleCreator implements Creator<DoubleString> {
041
042        protected final int n;
043
044        protected final Random random;
045
046        /**
047         * Constructs a {@link DoubleCreator}.
048         * 
049         * @param random
050         *            the random number generator
051         * @param n
052         *            the n value
053         */
054        @Inject
055        public DoubleCreator(Rand random, @N int n) {
056                super();
057                this.random = random;
058                this.n = n;
059        }
060
061        /*
062         * (non-Javadoc)
063         * 
064         * @see org.opt4j.core.problem.Creator#create()
065         */
066        @Override
067        public DoubleString create() {
068                DoubleString string = new DoubleString();
069                string.init(random, n);
070                return string;
071        }
072}
